name: Hammer It In!
description:
Hammer the nail in! Press the Space bar to hold the Hammer, release it to raise the Hammer, and press the Space bar again to slam down the Hammer. Be careful not to slam it down too much, or the nail may break. See how deep and how fast you can nail it down!

"The act of hammering a nail.... An act of violence, of creation, or of destruction? Only mankind may find satisfaction in such debauchery..." --Albert Einstein

"Perfectly encapsulates man's hubris." --Someone who saw the game through a Discord stream but hadn't played it

"Sorry the music sounds like shit I made it in the last 20 minutes" --The creator of this game
